tool_description: Calculates precise astronomical positions of all planets, Sun, and Moon for a specific date, time, and location using high-precision ephemeris data.

birth_datetime.description: Birth date and time in UTC format

latitude.description: Geographic latitude in decimal degrees (-90 to 90)

longitude.description: Geographic longitude in decimal degrees (-180 to 180)

include_asteroids.description: Include major asteroids (Chiron, Ceres, Pallas, Juno, Vesta)

error_messages: Invalid coordinates: Latitude must be between -90 and 90 degrees, longitude between -180 and 180 degrees.
Date out of range: Birth datetime must be between years 1800 and 2100 for accurate calculations.
Invalid coordinate system: Use either 'tropical' or 'sidereal'.
Calculation error: Unable to compute planetary positions for the given parameters - check date validity.
usage: Provide birth_datetime in UTC, latitude, and longitude. Optionally specify coordinate_system and whether to include_asteroids. Returns precise planetary positions in degrees of zodiac signs.

planetary_positions.description: Array of planetary positions in degrees [Mercury, Venus, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, Neptune, Pluto]

asteroid_positions.description: Array of asteroid positions in degrees if requested
